creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
description: Grid with various shades of brown squares and rectangles. At top a long horzontal gray form is tipped on a diagonal; silver metal frame
marks: Numbered in pencil, LL: [49/60] Signed in pencil, LR: [Pomodoro]
provenance: Mary Haldeman Dayton, Long Lake, Minn. (until d. 2010); estate of Mary Haldeman Dayton (2010; given to MIA)
title: Misuratori
